attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: please deport paddington bear as an illegal immigrant,as he sneaked into uk onboard a ship,even though he has evaded capture by the uk border agency and hmrc,for many years,he should still be deport,for the common criminal he is.
